title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the dialog, there are some issues that need to be addressed:
i. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns could be merged.

Additionally, the following problems are observed:
a. The buttons in the dialog are too small.
b. When the dialog appears, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
OB:
a. The buttons in the dialog are too small.
b. When the dialog appears, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
